urls.title: Digital euro
urls.description: Find out everything around a digital euro.

tweets.text: What is a #digitaleuro? It would be an electronic form of central bank money accessible to all citizens and firms – like banknotes, but in a digital form – to make your daily payments in a fast, easy and secure way. Find out more https://t.co/RiwOCers68

During this crisis, the ECB has been determined to maintain favourable financing conditions which are conducive to investment and will help the real economy recover, President Christine @Lagarde tells @aagalloni at the #ReutersNext conference. https://t.co/lYCtHQ63te

This is the Flag of Europe.

65 years ago today, it was adopted by the Council of Europe. 

It’s older than the European Union, or even the European Economic Community. It gestures towards collaboration, solidarity, and hope on our continent. 

It belongs to us all. 🤗 https://t.co/O7SGmxCPOQ

🎂 The European flag 🇪🇺 was adopted by @coe 65 years ago today and became the EU emblem in 1985. It guided us to what we are today.
